info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Lewis and Clark and central Jefferson Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles northwest of Basin to 9 miles southeast of Butte. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rainfall is likely with this line of storms. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Elk Park, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Clancy, Austin and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
